sections.title: About
body: A lost floating astronaut in space needs your help!
With no gravity and a unique single click movement system, maneuver the astronaut to safety while avoiding all the space junk that might cause them harm.
Play to survive the longest without colliding with the growning amount of space junk

sections.title: Project
body: Created in LibGDX's Game Jam 18 with the theme: "No Gravity" ( SEPTEMBER 2021 )
Developed and Distributed within a week's time in a solo team.
The Game Jam required a game designed and created within a weeks time based on the theme. In addition a post-mortem was written after submitting the game.
